process.command:
image_id bigserial,	
			scene_id text not null,	
			source text not null,	
			product text,
			folder text,
			acquisition_date_str varchar,
			acquisition_date date,
			path smallint,
			row smallint,
    		create_date date default current_date,
    		primary_key (source, product, folder, acquisition_date_str, path, row)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id text,	
            status char(1) not null,
            neighbors smallint,
    		primary_key (image_id, plot_id)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id text,	
            band varchar,
            srfi integer,
    		primary_key (image_id, plot_id, band)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id text,	
            band varchar,
            srfi integer,
    		primary_key (image_id, plot_id, band)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id text,	
            band varchar,
            srfi integer,
            srfi_std integer,
    		primary_key (image_id, plot_id, band)
